This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason where concept is-a _TransferActReason

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _TransferActReasonTransferActReasonThe explanation for why a patient is moved from one location to another within the organization

name: TransferActReason
title: TransferActReason
description: The explanation for why a patient is moved from one location to another within the organization
